name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
Week 1: Introducing each other, review lesson 1-3
Week 2: Lesson 4 - Photo story (my apartment)
Week 3: Lesson 4 - Rooms, definite articles, adjectives
Week 4: Lesson 4 - Furniture, colors, high numbers
Week 5: Lesson 4 - Making dialogs, listening and reading exercises
Week 6: Lesson 4 - Review, test
Week 7: Lesson 5 - Photo story (my day)
Week 8: Lesson 5 - Giving the time, activities at home
Week 9: Lesson 5 - My schedule from Monday to Friday
Week 10: Lesson 5 - Time of the day, opening hours, one day in Berlin
Week 11: Lesson 5 - Review, test
Week 12: Lesson 6 - Photo story (freetime)
Week 13: Lesson 6 - Talking about the weather
Week 14: Lesson 6 - Introducing new grammar: Akkusativ
Week 15: Lesson 6 - Positive answer on negative questions, freetime
Week 16: Lesson 6 - Review weather, weekend activities, test
Week 17: Lesson 7 - Photo story (learning)
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 10%
Tests after each lesson: 30%
Final exam: 50%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
